description:
Boris is from Russia. His English is new, but he does pretty well.
I always struggle giving direction to models who are new to the language. They obviously don't teach sex slang in the English and for some it is hard to know which is left and which is right.
Boris didn't have too many issues with directions, and thank goodness he was a natural in front of the camera.
He is a Bi dad, who seems to be more into women, but like many Bi guys, he likes to bottom when he is with men.
Boris does a fantastic job and was really turned-on by showing off for us!
title: Boris - Solo
